  • Uses of Event in Utils.Events

    Classes in Utils.Events that implement Event
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ErrorEvent
    Represents an error event within the system.
    class 
    ImageStateEvent
    Represents an event related to the state of an image processing task within the system.
    class 
    RegularEvent
    Represents a regular event within the system, typically used for standard operational notifications or actions that do not fall under specialized categories such as errors or image processing states.
    class 
    ServerEvent
    Represents an event related to server operations within the system.
    Methods in Utils.Events that return Event
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Event
    EventFactory.createErrorEvent(String message, EventTypes type, SeverityLevels severityLevel)
    Creates an ErrorEvent with the specified message, event type, and severity level.
    static Event
    EventFactory.createImageStateEvent(String message, EventTypes type, ImageStates imageState, SplitImage splitImage)
    Creates an ImageStateEvent with the specified message, event type, image state, and split image object.
    static Event
    EventFactory.createRegularEvent(String message, EventTypes type)
    Creates a RegularEvent with the specified message and event type.
    static Event
    EventFactory.createServerEvent(String message, EventTypes type, ServerStates serverState, int identifier)
    Creates a ServerEvent with the specified message, event type, server state, and identifier.
